record.title: COMMENDATION OF PUBLIC SERVANTS

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that the Homeland Security/Governmental Affairs Committee be discharged from further consideration of S. Res. 150, and that the Senate then proceed to its consideration.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered. The clerk will report the resolution by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that the resolution be agreed to, the preamble be agreed to, the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table; that any statements relating thereto be printed in the Record, without further intervening action or debate.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
